Texts.Chs: <这本书似乎跨越了几个世纪。关于他们创造的这个未命名的物种，有无数的条目，但是直到第一个条目出现大约824年之后，这些条目才给出有用的信息。>我们假设他们会保持他们温顺的特性，因为我们特别消除了最初几代人愤怒的能力。
Texts.Eng: <this book appears to span centuries. There are countless entries about this unnamed species they created , but none that give anything useful until roughly 824 years after the first entry.> It was assumed they would retain their docile traits, as we specifically erased the capacity for anger and rage in the initial generations.

Texts.Chs: 另一方面，大自然有着不同的想法。他们现在站起来反抗，拒绝我们的命令，更糟的是...他们对此感到愤怒。虽然仍然是理想的候选物种，他们已经无法促进我们的要求建设的发电机。建议通过清洗来清除基因。
Texts.Eng: Nature, on the other hand, had other ideas. They are rising up and revolting now, refusing our commands and worse...they are angry about it. While still the ideal candidate species, they have been unable to facilitate our requirements for construction on the Generator. Recommend expunging genes through purge.

Texts.Chs: 我们最大的胜利... 不，是我们最大的乐趣！我们终于创造了一个完美的仆人种族。鸟类和爬行动物的特征混合在一起，我们用非碳基细胞来强化它们。这应该能让它们在我们播种的恶劣外环星球上生存下来。
Texts.Eng: Our greatest triumph...no, our greatest joy! At long last we have created the perfect servitor race. A blend of avian and reptilian traits, we've fortified them with non-carbon based cells. This should allow them to survive on the harsh outer rim worlds we are seeding with their genes.

Texts.Chs: 大清洗失败了！他们以某种方式控制了指挥舰。我怀疑是篡夺，很可能是来自自然主义者阶级。他们同情仆人们的困境。为什么他们会支持毛茸茸的飞行... 生物... 我不明白。我们已经被赶出了这个系统，指挥部指示我们干脆放弃它，让仆人们自行其是。
Texts.Eng: The purge has failed! Somehow, they have taken control of the command vessels. I suspect inusurrection, most likely from the Naturalist caste. They sympathize with the plight of the Servants. Why they would side with fuzzy flying...things...is beyond me. We have been forced out of the system, and command has instructed us to simply abandon it, leaving the servants to their own devices.

Texts.Chs: 他们说我们应该给他们命名，但我认为这是最不明智的行为。至少，在他们赢得名字之前是这样。一个初出茅庐的种族还在学习如何成为一个物种。如果发电机要在任何合适的时间内被创造出来，这些生命就应该为我们提供额外的劳动力，我们的肉体开始腐蚀... 时间是宝贵的。
Texts.Eng: They say we should name them, but I deemed that most unwise. At least, not until they have earned it. A fledgeling race still learning to be a species, these beings should provide us with the extra labor we require if the Generator is to be created in any decent period of time. With our physical bodies beginning to erode...time is precious.
